bour.camus.gameofgooses.models.cells

Interface ICell

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCell, DepartureCell, GooseCell, NormalCell, TeleportCell, TrapCell, WaitCell

    public interface ICell
    Interface for the cells of the goose game..
    Author:
    Armand BOUR, Tristan CAMUS

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canBeLeftNow()
      Indicates if a player occupying this cell can, at this turn, leave the cell.
      Player empty()
      Empty the cell and returns the Player it used to contain.
      int getIndex()
      Gets the position of this cell in the board.
      Player getPlayer()
      Returns the Player currently occupying this cell.
      int handleMove(int diceThrow)
      Returns the index of the cell actually reached by a Player when he reaches this cell.
      boolean isBusy()
      Indicates if a player currently occupies this cell.
      boolean isRetaining()
      Indicates if a cell holds a player until another player reaches the same cell.
      void noticeUIOfTypeOfCell(Player player, IGameWatcher ui) 
      void welcome(Player player)
      Welcomes the Player.

    • Method Detail

      • canBeLeftNow

        boolean canBeLeftNow()
        Indicates if a player occupying this cell can, at this turn, leave the cell.
        Returns:
        true if the player in this cell can freely leaves the cell at this turn ; false else.

      • isRetaining

        boolean isRetaining()
        Indicates if a cell holds a player until another player reaches the same cell.
        Returns:
        true if the only way for a player to get out of this cell is for another another player to replace him ; false else.

      • getIndex

        int getIndex()
        Gets the position of this cell in the board.
        Returns:
        a number greater or equal to 0 (for the starting cell only).

      • handleMove

        int handleMove(int diceThrow)
        Returns the index of the cell actually reached by a Player when he reaches this cell. For normal cells, the returned value equals getIndex() and is thus independent from diceThrow.
        Parameters:
        diceThrow - The result of the dice when the player reaches this cell.
        Returns:
        The index of the cell effectively reached when a player reaches this cell after the given throw of dice.

      • isBusy

        boolean isBusy()
        Indicates if a player currently occupies this cell.
        Returns:
        true if a player is in this cell ; false else.

      • getPlayer

        Player getPlayer()
        Returns the Player currently occupying this cell.
        Returns:
        The player currently in this cell, null if none.

      • welcome

        void welcome(Player player)
        Welcomes the Player. This method is called when a new Player arrives on the cell.
        Parameters:
        player - The newcoming Player.

      • empty

        Player empty()
        Empty the cell and returns the Player it used to contain.
        Returns:
        The Player that the cell used to contain. null if the cell was already empty.

      • noticeUIOfTypeOfCell

        void noticeUIOfTypeOfCell(Player player,
                        IGameWatcher ui)
